pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.extraction

Class RepoHistoryExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.edu.mimuw.changeanalyzer.extraction.RepoHistoryExtractor

  • public class RepoHistoryExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    Master class of the extraction package. It extracts all class histories and all commits from a repository.
    Author:
    Adam Wierzbicki
